hexaware_chatagent.embeddingSourceText: ChatAgent project Hexaware Senior Plus FullStack Engineer AI powered tools MCP server WebSocket API React AgGrid Python TypeScript LangChain KeyClock GitLab deployment containerisation fully-customisable system client configuration

responses.hr: Led the ChatAgent project at Hexaware as Senior Plus FullStack Engineer, developing AI-powered tools with MCP servers. Managed full-stack development, WebSocket communication, and GitLab deployment pipelines.
responses.developer: Working on ChatAgent - a fully customizable AI system using React, Python, and LangChain. Built WebSocket APIs, integrated MCP servers, and handled the full deployment pipeline with containerization.
responses.friend: Currently working on this super cool AI project called ChatAgent! It's like building the future - AI agents that can read user info and help with different tools. The tech stack is amazing! ü§ñ

details.description: Development of a fully-customisable system composed by client configuration and intended to integrate AI powered tools on different levels. Agents could read user information and provide assistance using MCP server and tools.
achievements: Led development of FE application in collaboration with UX/UI designer
Configured client-server communication channel using WebSocket API
Designed and implemented data format and LLM prompt response to render different chart types
Configured GitLab deployment pipeline and containerisation flow for QA process

hexaware_bonfire.embeddingSourceText: Bonfire dating app Hexaware Frontend Team Lead 60% coding 40% management NX monorepo TypeScript React Jest Playwright SonarCloud Scrum team management brand configuration UI library components

responses.hr: Led the Bonfire dating app project as Frontend Team Lead (60% coding/40% management). Built NX monorepo architecture, implemented comprehensive testing with Jest/Playwright, and managed team using Scrum methodology.
responses.developer: Built a configurable dating app platform using NX monorepo with TypeScript and React. Set up comprehensive testing pipeline with Jest/Playwright, integrated SonarCloud, and managed the team processes.
responses.friend: Led this really interesting dating app project! The cool part was building it as a configurable platform - each brand could customize their own version. Plus I got to balance coding with team leadership! üíï

details.project_description: Dating App platform with target to specific audience group. A Web app was built to be configured per brand and use core flow from a matching engine.
achievements: Configured app monorepo using NX where each app represented a module
Build pre-configuration for unit (Jest) and e2e (Playwright) tests coverage
Implemented pre-commit hooks to maintain feedback loop between QA and Engineering team
Implemented custom event based system using Axios interceptors
Assisted team members during development, MR review and performed ceremonies to follow Scrum framework

hexaware_notification.embeddingSourceText: Notification System Hexaware Frontend Team Lead 70% coding 30% management safety regulations monitoring AI solutions React Node.js Flutter Azure DevOps national service provider 6000 employees

responses.hr: Led the Notification System project as Frontend Team Lead (70% coding/30% management) for a national service provider with 6000+ employees. Built safety regulation system using React, Node.js, and AI solutions with Azure DevOps.
responses.developer: Built a comprehensive safety notification system for a large organization. Assembled and led the FE team, worked with React/Node.js stack, integrated AI helper solutions, and managed Azure DevOps pipelines.
responses.friend: This was a really impactful project - helping 6000+ people stay safe at work! I got to build the team from scratch and create a system that actually makes a difference in people's daily safety. üõ°Ô∏è

details.project_description: System to help employees and managers with safety regulations and monitoring in facilities using AI solutions and modern technologies for a national level service provider with 6000+ people.
achievements: Assembled FE team and onboarded each member to the project
Provided all necessary documentation and tools to build application
Worked with strict deadlines and demanding client presentations
Responsible for feature design with UI/UX designers and BA
Assisted BE team to develop API response schemas following BFF approach
Built and maintained deployment pipelines using Azure DevOps

eriksdigital_webshop.embeddingSourceText: Eriks WebShop EriksDigital Frontend Team Lead WebSphere ECommerce headless React Redux performance optimization SEO Google Lighthouse translation Localise monolithic architecture transition

responses.hr: Led WebShop modernization at EriksDigital as Frontend Team Lead, transitioning from WebSphere to headless React architecture. Improved performance, SEO compliance, and implemented automated translation workflows.
responses.developer: Modernized a legacy WebSphere e-commerce platform by gradually transitioning to headless React apps. Used Redux for state management, optimized for Google Lighthouse, and automated translation workflows with Localise.
responses.friend: This was like digital archaeology! Taking this old WebSphere monster and gradually turning it into a modern React-based system. The performance improvements were incredible to see! üöÄ

details.project_description: Gradual transition from monolithic WebSphere ECommerce platform to headless front-end using React. Each new feature as separate React App with shared Redux state.
achievements: Led knowledge transfer process and team assembly
Re-developed various WebShop modules as headless solutions
Improved performance and SEO to comply with Google Lighthouse requirements
Automated translation flow and replaced custom tool with Localise
Created dynamic navigation panel based on client location for EU countries

adam_webshop.embeddingSourceText: A-Dam WebShop Senior Frontend Engineer e-commerce SPA Next.js Apollo GraphQL Saleor platform 100% revenue increase US China market B2B bulk orders performance optimization

responses.hr: Built e-commerce SPA at A-Dam that increased yearly revenue by over 100%. Transitioned from React to Next.js, integrated with Saleor platform, and expanded to US and China markets with B2B functionality.
responses.developer: Built a complete e-commerce solution using React/Next.js with Apollo/GraphQL. Integrated with Saleor platform, optimized for performance, and created separate B2B version with bulk ordering features.
responses.friend: This was such a success story! We literally doubled the company's revenue with this e-commerce site. Plus we got to contribute back to the Saleor platform - that was pretty cool! üí∞

details.project_description: E-commerce web-shop SPA for Amsterdam-based company, integrating web-shop, warehouse management, and tax reporting tools. Expanded market share in US and China.
achievements: Built and shipped first version increasing yearly revenue by over 100%
Developed user flow for three-click purchases from social media ads
Completed transition from React to Next.js for improved UX and render time
Created B2B fork with bulk ordering and pre-order features
Developed complex Apollo wrappers for caching and load time optimization
Contributed platform improvements that were sold to Saleor owners

digitalchefs_klm.embeddingSourceText: KLM Flight Assistant DigitalChefs Middle Frontend Engineer ReactNative application KLM flight crew onboard service passengers catering multimedia shopping CRM Express Node.js aircraft configuration

responses.hr: Developed ReactNative application for KLM flight crew at DigitalChefs, enabling onboard passenger services including catering, multimedia, and shopping. Also built CRM system for aircraft-specific configurations.
responses.developer: Built a ReactNative app for KLM flight crew to manage onboard services. Also developed a CRM system using Express and Node.js to configure app settings per aircraft type. Pretty cool aviation tech!
responses.friend: Working on something for KLM was amazing! Building an app that flight crews actually use to serve passengers - catering, entertainment, shopping. Plus the CRM to configure it per plane type! ‚úàÔ∏è

details.project_description: Native ReactNative application to assist KLM flight crew in providing onboard services including catering, multimedia, and shopping experience.
achievements: Developed application UI components and navigation with project designer
Built CRM system using Express and Node.js for aircraft-specific configuration

digitalchefs_taxafax.embeddingSourceText: Taxafax DigitalChefs Middle Frontend Engineer ReactNative application Dutch tax law advice tax reports multi-user support login flow client collaboration tight deadlines

responses.hr: Built ReactNative application for Dutch tax law assistance at DigitalChefs. Developed tax reporting functionality and expanded from single-user to multi-user system with authentication.
responses.developer: Created a ReactNative app for Dutch tax law advice and report generation. Started as single-user but expanded to multi-user with login flow. Worked closely with client under tight deadlines.
responses.friend: Tax law might not sound exciting, but building an app that actually helps people navigate Dutch taxes was pretty rewarding! Plus the challenge of scaling from single to multi-user was fun! üìä

details.project_description: Native ReactNative application to assist and advise on Dutch tax law per client type, helping create different tax reports and showcase status.
achievements: Developed application design and structure with UI components
Worked in tight collaboration with client for optimal results
Expanded from single-user to multi-user support with login flow

frontend_stack.embeddingSourceText: Frontend skills TypeScript JavaScript React ReactNative Next.js Redux Axios HTML CSS SCSS StyledComponents 10+ years experience modern patterns hooks performance optimization component architecture responsive design

responses.hr: Expert in modern frontend technologies including TypeScript, React, Next.js, and React Native with 10+ years of experience. Proven track record in performance optimization, component architecture, and responsive design.
responses.developer: I'm deep into the modern frontend stack - TypeScript, React (including Native), Next.js, Redux, and all the usual suspects. Love working with hooks, optimizing performance, and building solid component architectures.
responses.friend: Frontend is my jam! Been working with React for years, love TypeScript, and I'm always excited about the latest patterns and optimizations. Building great UIs is what gets me up in the morning! üé®

responses.hr: Strong backend capabilities with Node.js, TypeScript, and modern frameworks like NestJS. Experienced in API development (GraphQL, REST, WebSocket), database integration with Prisma ORM, and Apollo.
responses.developer: I work with Node.js and TypeScript on the backend, using NestJS and Express. Comfortable with different API patterns - GraphQL, REST, WebSocket - and database work with Prisma ORM and Apollo.
responses.friend: Backend work is really satisfying too! I love building solid APIs with Node.js and TypeScript. GraphQL, REST, WebSocket - whatever the project needs. Database design with Prisma is pretty sweet! üîß

responses.hr: Comprehensive testing expertise with Jest, Playwright, Cypress, and React Testing Library. Strong focus on quality assurance, test automation, and maintaining high code coverage standards.
responses.developer: I'm big on testing - Jest for unit tests, Playwright and Cypress for e2e, RTL for React components. Love setting up comprehensive test pipelines and integrating with tools like SonarCloud for quality gates.
responses.friend: Testing might not be the most glamorous part, but I actually love it! There's something satisfying about building bulletproof test suites. Jest, Playwright, the whole testing ecosystem - it's great! üß™

responses.friend: DevOps is like the magic that makes everything work smoothly! Azure, GitLab, Docker - I love setting up those automated pipelines that just make deployment a breeze! üöÄ
